Package controller

Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
controller.MainMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainMenu extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class initializes the main menu screen for the inventory management.

    • ModifyPartCLick

      public void ModifyPartCLick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Method for loading the modify part form when clicked. RUNTIME ERROR: Had a hard time figuring out how to send all of the data back over to the modify Part/Product pages and this was the best solution I came up with. The other iterations either sent some data over or none at all.

      IOException
